languages.text: {n}Преподобная с ног до головы увешана драгоценностями — даже ее ногти покрыты позолотой, а улыбка обнажает инкрустированные перламутром зубы.{/n} "Великий Светоч, влады{mf|ка|чица} наш{mf||а}!"
{n}The confessor is covered head to toe in jewellery. Even her nails are gilded, and her smile reveals teeth inlaid with mother-of-pearl.{/n} "Great Beacon, our glorious {mf|master|mistress}!"
languages.original_text: {n}Преподобная с ног до головы увешана драгоценностями — даже ее ногти покрыты позолотой, а улыбка обнажает инкрустированные перламутром зубы.{/n} "Великий Светоч, влады{mf|ка|чица} наш{mf||а}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The confessor is covered in jewellery from head to toe. Even her nails are gilded, and her smile bares her teeth inlaid with mother-of-pearl.{/n} "Great Beacon, our glorious {mf|master|mistress}!"

languages.text: {n}Die Konfessorin ist von Kopf bis Fuß mit Schmuck behängt. Selbst ihre Nägel sind vergoldet und ihr Lächeln offenbart mit Perlmutt verzierte Zähne.{/n} "Großes Leuchtfeuer, {mf|unser ruhmreicher Meister|unsere ruhmreiche Meisterin}!"
languages.original_text: {n}The confessor is covered head to toe in jewellery. Even her nails are gilded, and her smile reveals teeth inlaid with mother-of-pearl.{/n} "Great Beacon, our glorious {mf|master|mistress}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Konfessorin ist von Kopf bis Fuß mit Schmuck behängt. Selbst ihre Nägel sind vergoldet und ihr Lächeln offenbart mit Perlmutt verzierte Zähne.{/n} "Großes Leuchtfeuer, {mf|unser ruhmreicher Meister|unsere ruhmreiche Meisterin}!"

languages.text: {n}La confesseuse est couverte de bijoux des pieds à la tête. Même ses ongles sont dorés, et en souriant, elle dévoile une rangée de dents incrustées de nacre.{/n} « Guide suprême, notre {mf|glorieux maître|glorieuse maîtresse} ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The confessor is covered head to toe in jewellery. Even her nails are gilded, and her smile reveals teeth inlaid with mother-of-pearl.{/n} "Great Beacon, our glorious {mf|master|mistress}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La confesseuse est couverte de bijoux des pieds à la tête. Même ses ongles sont dorés, et en souriant, elle dévoile une rangée de dents incrustées de nacre.{/n} « Guide suprême, notre {mf|glorieux maître|glorieuse maîtresse} ! »

languages.text: {n}La confesora está cubierta de joyas de la cabeza a los pies. Hasta sus uñas están doradas y su sonrisa muestra dientes engastados en madreperla.{/n} «¡Gran Faro, nuestr{mf|o|a} glorios{mf|o|a} am{mf|o|a}!».
languages.original_text: {n}The confessor is covered head to toe in jewellery. Even her nails are gilded, and her smile reveals teeth inlaid with mother-of-pearl.{/n} "Great Beacon, our glorious {mf|master|mistress}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La confesora está cubierta de joyas de la cabeza a los pies. Hasta sus uñas están doradas y su sonrisa muestra dientes engastados en madreperla.{/n} «¡Gran Faro, nuestr{mf|o|a} glorios{mf|o|a} am{mf|o|a}!».

languages.text: {n}聴罪師は頭のてっぺんからつま先まで宝石で覆われている。爪にも金メッキが施され、彼女がほほ笑むと、真珠で象嵌された歯が見えた。{/n}「大いなる烽火よ、我らが栄光の主」
languages.original_text: {n}The confessor is covered head to toe in jewellery. Even her nails are gilded, and her smile reveals teeth inlaid with mother-of-pearl.{/n} "Great Beacon, our glorious {mf|master|mistress}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}聴罪師は頭のてっぺんからつま先まで宝石で覆われている。爪にも金メッキが施され、彼女がほほ笑むと、真珠で象嵌された歯が見えた。{/n}「大いなる烽火よ、我らが栄光の主」

languages.text: {n}这位告解神父从头到脚都戴着珠宝，甚至连指甲都是镀金的。她笑了起来，露出了镶着珍珠母贝的牙齿。{/n}“噢，至高明光！我们伟大的主人！”
languages.original_text: {n}The confessor is covered head to toe in jewellery. Even her nails are gilded, and her smile reveals teeth inlaid with mother-of-pearl.{/n} "Great Beacon, our glorious {mf|master|mistress}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}这位告解神父从头到脚都戴着珠宝，甚至连指甲都是镀金的。她笑了起来，露出了镶着珍珠母贝的牙齿。{/n}“噢，至高明光！我们伟大的主人！”

languages.text: {n}Günah çıkarıcı tepeden tırnağa mücevheratla kaplı. Tırnakları bile yaldızlı ve güldüğünde sedef kakma dişleri ortaya çıkıyor.{/n} "Yüce Kılavuz, ulu efendimiz!"
languages.original_text: {n}The confessor is covered head to toe in jewellery. Even her nails are gilded, and her smile reveals teeth inlaid with mother-of-pearl.{/n} "Great Beacon, our glorious {mf|master|mistress}!"
